com.team5.courseassignment

Class ImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team5.courseassignment.ImageLoader

  • public class ImageLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object that can load images from a URL on a thread.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ImageLoader.ImageLoadedListener
      Defines an interface for a callback that will handle responses from the thread loader when an image is done being loaded.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageLoader()
      Creates a new instance of the ImageThreadLoader

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bitmap loadImage(java.lang.String uri, ImageLoader.ImageLoadedListener listener)
      Queues up a URI to load an image from for a given image view.
      static Bitmap readBitmapFromNetwork(java.net.URL url)
      Convenience method to retrieve a bitmap image from a URL over the network.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ImageLoader

        public ImageLoader()
        Creates a new instance of the ImageThreadLoader

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        public Bitmap loadImage(java.lang.String uri,
               ImageLoader.ImageLoadedListener listener)
                 throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Queues up a URI to load an image from for a given image view.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI source of the image
        callback - The listener class to call when the image is loaded
        Returns:
        A Bitmap image if the image is in the cache, else null.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - If the provided uri cannot be parsed

      • readBitmapFromNetwork

        public static Bitmap readBitmapFromNetwork(java.net.URL url)
        Convenience method to retrieve a bitmap image from a URL over the network. The built-in methods do not seem to work, as they return a FileNotFound exception. Note that this does not perform any threading -- it blocks the call while retrieving the data.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to read the bitmap from.
        Returns:
        A Bitmap image or null if an error occurs.
